description:
Sales of sparkling wine producers

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73423 Sparkling wine tax statistics

Definition:
The sales by producers of sparkling wine with an alcoholic
strength by volume of 6% vol or more (standard rate) and of
sparkling wine with an alcoholic strength of less than 6%
vol (reduced rate) are determined from the total quantities
produced. The sales include all taxed and untaxed
quantities.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Sales of sparkling wine producers
